THE OVATION SELECT UPGRADE FOR GULFSTREAM AVAILABLE THROUGH CONSTANT AVIATION
If you're one of the many business jet owners still flying around with an outdated cabin management system in your Gulfstream GIV/GV, G450 or G550, you've probably outgrown the cassette player, VCR and the old technology that is still in your aircraft.
Give your cabin a face lift and upgrade to Ovation Select™ with Constant Aviation and get a 100% digitally-driven cabin management and an in-flight entertainment solution that is specifically designed to improve your in-flight experience and complement your cabin for many years to come!
With Ovation Select, You don't have to get rid of your current configuration. In fact, with Honeywell's PED technology, you can access all of your current features from the convenience of your mobile device without all the extra costs that come with other systems - it's that simple!
When you upgrade to Ovation Select, you'll be able to:
- Control lighting, temperature, shades, galley functions and audio/video from the convenience of your seat. - Watch satellite TV or a high-definition Blu-ray movie with full surround sound with your new in-flight entertainment system. - Review presentations, stream content and much more on high-definition monitors from your mobile device.
Learn more about Honeywell's Ovation Select cabin management system upgrade available through Constant Aviation and see why so many business jet owners are using it today!
